thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Dalong Weiye Real Estate Development sees 2017 net profit down about 79 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Dalong Weiye Real Estate Development sees 2017 net profit down about 79 pct

organizations.name: beijing dalong weiye real estate development co ltd

text:
Jan 30(Reuters) - Beijing Dalong Weiye Real Estate Development Co Ltd
* Sees 2017 net profit to decrease by about 79 percent
* Says 2016 net profit was 101 million yuan
* Says that sharply decreased operation revenue of real estate business as the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/PURkDM
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
